t: Amazon.com: rocabi Weighted Blanket for Adults King Size Luxury Set (20 lbs, 80"x86") Includes Plush Minky Removable Cover & Heavy Glass Beads for Calming Sleep : Home & Kitchen
s: This is the best brand of weighted blanket to buy. I really read alot of reviews of Rocabi as well as the many other brands out there. I think Rocabi has mastered the weighted blanket. I have purchased 4 blankets. The first blanket was a 60x80 (15 pounds) which says it fits up to a queen.
